channel.title: Navan Badminton Club
channel.description: Welcome to Navan Badminton Club located at Claremont Stadium in Navan, Co. Meath, Ireland. Club nights every Monday and Wednesday during the season which runs from September to April. Club caters for Adults and Juveniles of all standards from beginner to advanced.

item.title: Badminton at Claremont Stadium Tonight!
item.description: Join us tonight at Claremont Stadium for exciting badminton matches with courts open from 8:30pm to 11pm. Don't miss the action!
item.author: badminton@navanbadmintonclub.com (Navan Badminton Club)

item.title: Badminton Club Update
item.description: Our badminton club membership is full. Only current members can join Club Nights. Updates will be shared soon.
item.author: badminton@navanbadmintonclub.com (Navan Badminton Club)

item.title: Match Week Update: Upcoming Games and Club Nights
item.description: Get ready for an exciting week with 4 matches in the Men's and Ladies' divisions and check out our club night schedule.
item.author: badminton@navanbadmintonclub.com (Navan Badminton Club)

item.title: Week 1 Results
item.description: A recap of the first week of the season for Navan teams, highlighting lessons learned and future determination after challenging matches.
item.author: badminton@navanbadmintonclub.com (Navan Badminton Club)

item.title: Thursday Badminton Fun!
item.description: Join us at Claremont Stadium for Beginner Club Night from 9pm to 11pm. Open to all skill levels with courts for team games and open play.
item.author: badminton@navanbadmintonclub.com (Navan Badminton Club)

item.title: üéæüè∏ Game Night Announcement
item.description: Join us for our first home match of the new season. Exciting matches await with Navan 'A' vs Skryne starting at 8pm. Come and cheer for our team!
item.author: badminton@navanbadmintonclub.com (Navan Badminton Club)

item.title: Meath Leagues Return with Exciting Matches
item.description: The Meath Leagues are back with matches on 16th October 2024. Support our teams as they aim for victory!
item.author: badminton@navanbadmintonclub.com (Navan Badminton Club)

item.title: üè∏ Play at Claremont Stadium Tonight!
item.description: Join us at Claremont Stadium as the Meath Leagues return this week. Practice your game with all courts open and everyone welcome!
item.author: badminton@navanbadmintonclub.com (Navan Badminton Club)

item.title: Badminton Night Alert!
item.description: Join us for a night of badminton practice and fun at Claremont Stadium. All courts open for all skill levels!
item.author: badminton@navanbadmintonclub.com (Navan Badminton Club)

item.title: üåü Beginner Club Night at Claremont Stadium üåü
item.description: Join us for a fun beginner badminton night at Claremont Stadium. All are welcome!
item.author: badminton@navanbadmintonclub.com (Navan Badminton Club)

item.title: üè∏ Join Us at Claremont Stadium Tonight!
item.description: Join us at Claremont Stadium for a fun-filled evening of badminton. Open courts from 8pm to 11pm, with a special Juvenile Club Night starting at 6:30pm for ages 14+.
item.author: badminton@navanbadmintonclub.com (Navan Badminton Club)

item.title: üéâ Smash into October at Claremont Stadium! üè∏
item.description: Join us on the last day of September at Claremont Stadium for a fun evening of badminton. Open courts and activities for all ages!
item.author: badminton@navanbadmintonclub.com (Navan Badminton Club)

item.title: Beginner Club Night at Claremont Stadium
item.description: Join us tonight from 9pm to 11pm at Claremont Stadium for Beginner Club Night. Whether you're new to badminton or need some practice, we'll have you rallying quickly. All 4 courts are open for a fun-filled evening!
item.author: badminton@navanbadmintonclub.com (Navan Badminton Club)

item.title: Wednesday Club Night at Claremont Stadium
item.description: Join us tonight from 8pm to 11pm at Claremont Stadium for Wednesday Club Night. Whether you're great at badminton or just starting, we‚Äôve got a court for you. Everyone‚Äôs welcome!
item.author: badminton@navanbadmintonclub.com (Navan Badminton Club)

item.title: Join Us at Claremont Stadium for a New Badminton Season!
item.description: The new badminton season is almost here! Join us at Claremont Stadium for some exciting games. Whether you're a pro or a beginner, there's space for everyone. Don't miss out!
item.author: badminton@navanbadmintonclub.com (Navan Badminton Club)

item.title: Club Night
item.description: Join us tonight from 8pm to 11pm at Claremont Stadium. All skill levels are welcome; we have 4 courts ready for you!
item.author: badminton@navanbadmintonclub.com (Navan Badminton Club)

item.title: Shuttle Time!
item.description: Join us at Claremont Stadium for some shuttle action! All ages welcome. Sign up by Friday, 20th September to join a team. Juvenile Club returns tonight!
item.author: badminton@navanbadmintonclub.com (Navan Badminton Club)
